backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for project evidence tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high-level descriptions of all frontend files and their roles in the app's structure, styling, and romantic features.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and defines a comprehensive light/dark theme using CSS variables for colors and UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint that preloads background music and mounts the React SPA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures React Router routes for all pages and wraps them with MusicProvider and RomanticLayout.
frontend/src/components/romance/Countdow: Displays a live countdown to Proposal Day or a celebratory message once the date arrives.
frontend/src/components/romance/EasterEg: Interactive heart button that opens a modal revealing a secret romantic message.
frontend/src/components/romance/MusicPro: Manages background music playback with autoplay handling, state syncing, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/romance/MusicTog: Button that toggles background music on and off, reflecting current playback state.
frontend/src/components/romance/Overlays: Renders fixed decorative overlays of rose petals and glowing hearts with drift animations.
frontend/src/components/romance/Romantic: Provides the global page layout with watermark, overlays, fixed UI controls, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown.ts: Provides a React hook that calculates remaining time until a target date and updates it every minute.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, exposing identity, login, and logout state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom romantic-themed colors, utilities, fonts, shadows, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/FeelMyLove.tsx: Displays an interactive romantic page with heart animations and timed messages, leading to the proposal page.
frontend/src/pages/Forever.tsx: Renders a final romantic message page with animations, heartfelt text, and themed images symbolizing lasting love.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Shows the homepage with animated backgrounds, floating hearts, and an introduction leading to the love story section.
frontend/src/pages/LoveLetter.tsx: Renders a decorative love letter page with styled background, heartfelt text, and animated elements.
frontend/src/pages/OurStory.tsx: Shows a milestone-based timeline of the couple’s story with animated cards and a themed backdrop.
frontend/src/pages/Proposal.tsx: Displays a timed proposal sequence with text reveals and celebratory animations based on user choice.
frontend/src/pages/WhyILoveYou.tsx: Provides interactive flip cards listing reasons for love, with animated hearts and a themed layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, requirements, features, issues, and metadata for a romantic multi‑page proposal website. Highlights persistent background‑music problems and lists required visuals and implemented features.
